Subject: An incredibly obese man with a round, cheerful face, double chin, and rosy cheeks.
Wearing a tight, neon-green spandex cycling suit that is stretching transparently over his belly.
He has a tiny aerodynamic helmet perched on top of a large head.
Sweat dripping profusely, intense determination in his wide eyes.
Massive calves and thighs bulging against the fabric.
Action: He is attempting to ride a tiny, child-sized tricycle with pink tassels on the handlebars.
His knees are flared out ridiculously wide to accommodate his stomach.
The tricycle's wheels are squashed flat into ovals under the weight.
Sparks are flying from the metal rims grinding against the asphalt.
He is hunched over in a professional racing posture, creating a comedic contrast with the slow speed.
Scene: A professional Tour de France style race track.
Blurred crowd in the background cheering wildly.
Bright, sunny daylight with high contrast shadows.
Asphalt road texture with skid marks.
Confetti falling from the sky.
scenario1.Style: 9:16 vertical aspect ratio, hyper-realistic, vivid colors, 4k, wide angle lens

Subject: A massive, incredibly obese woman with towering, frizzy red hair.
Wearing an elegant, glittery pink ballerina tutu and satin toe shoes.
Her arms are thick and soft, adorned with sparkling bracelets.
She has a look of serene, spiritual focus, eyes closed, mouth in a gentle smile.
Pale skin, heavy theatrical makeup.
Action: She is performing a gravity-defying 'Grand Jet√©' leap mid-air.
Despite her size, she is floating effortlessly high above the stage.
Her toe points perfectly, but the wooden floorboards below are splintering and exploding upwards just from the anticipation of her landing.
Dust and wood chips are suspended in the air around her feet.
Scene: A grand, ornate opera house stage with red velvet curtains.
A spotlight hits her directly, creating a halo effect.
Dark auditorium background.
Orchestra pit visible below, musicians looking up in terrified awe.
scenario2.Style: 9:16 vertical aspect ratio, dramatic lighting, cinematic composition, surreal humor

Subject: An incredibly obese elderly man with a thick white beard and sunglasses.
Wearing a Hawaiian floral shirt unbuttoned to reveal a massive belly and oversized cargo shorts.
Holding a tiny cocktail with a little umbrella in one large hand.
Sunburned skin, relaxed facial expression.
Action: He is lying on a flimsy, white plastic lawn chair that has completely given up.
The legs of the chair have splayed out flat like a starfish.
He is sunken so low that his butt is touching the grass, but he is acting as if nothing happened.
A nearby inflatable beach ball is being sucked toward him by his gravitational pull.
Scene: A pristine, expensive swimming pool deck.
Palm trees and a blue sky in the background.
Crystal clear blue water.
Bright, harsh midday sun causing strong reflections on the water and his sunglasses.
scenario3.Style: 9:16 vertical aspect ratio, GoPro aesthetic, fish-eye lens, vibrant summer colors

Subject: An incredibly obese man dressed in a tactical black ninja outfit.
Only his eyes are visible through the mask, which is visibly straining.
A katana sword is strapped to his back but looks like a toothpick compared to his width.
He is wearing tabi boots that are bulging at the seams.
Action: He is attempting to hide behind a very thin bamboo stalk.
His body extends visibly for three feet on either side of the bamboo.
He is holding a pose of stealth, tip-toeing, with 'shush' finger to his masked mouth.
A wooden floorboard beneath him is bending into a U-shape.
Scene: A traditional Japanese dojo with tatami mats.
Paper screen doors (shoji) in the background.
Soft, warm lantern lighting.
Dust motes dancing in the light beams.
Minimalist decor which contrasts with his maximalist size.
scenario4.Style: 9:16 vertical aspect ratio, comedic timing, sharp focus, high definition

Subject: An incredibly obese teenager with messy hair and acne.
Wearing a graphic t-shirt that is stretched so much the image on it is unrecognizable.
Baggy jeans that are slipping down slightly.
Wearing oversized headphones around his neck.
Action: He is at a playground attempting to go down a yellow spiral tube slide.
He is visibly stuck at the very top entrance, plugged in like a cork in a bottle.
His cheeks are pressed against the transparent plastic of the slide, squished hilariously.
Pressure builds up behind him, visualized by cartoonish steam or distortion.
Scene: A colorful outdoor playground.
Blue sky with fluffy clouds.
Wood chips on the ground.
Other children in the background looking up and pointing.
Bright, saturated primary colors (red, yellow, blue) of the playground equipment.
scenario5.Style: 9:16 vertical aspect ratio, slapstick comedy style, bright lighting, highly detailed textures
